title: Imagine if Udyr R was somthing along the lines of Olaf's.
body:
Just a normal 1 minute long cool down like any other and is extremely useful, particularly in comparison to what he has.

Edit: Honestly am puzzled to all hell why anyone would be against changing the useless ability that is phoenix stance. K he shouldn't have a proper ult whatever, but can he have a R that's worth something?

replies.body:
Udyr is more than fine as is

Also, his stance swapping and no ulti is unique to him
Lol so its okay that he effectively has 1 less ability then every other champion? k then... so any rational person knows to disregard what you say on this subject.
He has 1 less ultimate ability than every other champion, and yes it's okay because he's balanced around it.

he doesn't have an "R"
look at his skill maxing in any guide out there! He effectively has a Q, W, and E. That's it!
You leave him alone
Yeah, cause effectively no "R"(as in no forth ability) is just fine and dandy.,, I think I just realized the real reason why the game is the way it is.
Don't kid yourself. Udyr effectively only ever had 3 abilities. It was either "ignore tiger stance" or "ignore phoenix stance". You never leveled both at the same time.

Udyr is already very strong and viable. He is also one of the few unique champions out there, no one else has a kit like his. 

Giving him immunity to CC would make him op
K but he doesn't have a forth ability most of the game cause it sucks that bad. That's not okay... also immunity to cc is op on any high dmg champ and guess what....
Yeah, that's why they don't give out cc immunity. I'm not sure what your point with that is other than don't give Udyr what you just asked for.

So they didn't give master yi or olaf cc immunity? Hmmm nope just looked it up and they did.  Point is hs R is useless to the point he effectively has 1 less ability. This champion can only move and auto, so something to assist in these would be nice.

They don't give out cc immunity to high damage champs.
Yi is not CC immune, you obviously didn't look it up or just have no idea what CC means, it includes stuns, roots, and suppression. Olaf is immune but he isn't high damage.
His R isn't useless some people max R first.
What if his R gave him his q w  and e all at once with an attack speed steroid on a long cd. That would be nutty af

my wish is to give him a means to get on top of enemies despite the immense amount of cc in the game without absolutely having to get items for the fact. He doesn't really need more attack speed, he has enough.
Regardless even that would be better then not having any ult at all as is the case.

> [{quoted}](name=Boatwhistle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QHu2BMBx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-12T05:20:56.627+0000)
>
> my wish is to give him a means to get on top of enemies despite the immense amount of cc in the game without absolutely having to get items for the fact. He doesn't really need more attack speed, he has enough.
> Regardless even that would be better then not having any ult at all as is the case.

He would be busted if he had a gap closer or something. Udyr is actually one of the strongest(if not THE strongest) stat check champs out there. He needs a rework tbh.
That doesn't change the fact he doesn't have a forth ability, that's not okay. If not a gap closer then just something with a purpose.

Phoenix Stance was his strongest damage ability for almost six years. The main reason it's not that strong right now is because it got nerfed to shit when Runic Echoes was released in Season 6, and it takes too long to scale into relevancy as a result.

It still remained his most viable option until Tiger got reworked into its current state back in Season 7 as well.

With that in mind, giving it more general power/early game relevancy would go a long way for the stance. It has its place, it's just not the best fit for the current pacing of the game given it's a scaling AOE ability designed for bruiser-ish or full tank builds in a world where Udyr's better off being an early game menace and building more offensively than defensively.
That would be a Sylas buff.
LOL

Udyr's entire schtick is to not have an ultimate at all.

He has four basic abilities.

Personally I want Udyr to have a wall climbing/jumping skill.

He was supposed to have came from the mountains/wild, so why is it he can't go through trees/over rocks?

Should be one of the benefits of Bear Stance - since it does have a cooldown. Maybe expend 200% Mana on Bear stance to go over terrain. 

While I'm at it...... How about expend 300% Mana cost Phoenix Stance to gain the ability to resurrect if you die at 25% HP, with a cooldown on the benefit of something like 300 seconds.

Those two changes would make Udyr really fun to play.

i agree with you lately udyrs r has been kinda lackluster but that has more to do with itemization and jungle changes more then to the skill itself.
also they might've put too much power budget on his tiger stance awhile ago. ( after its xth mini rework )
if riot really wants udyrs to use his phoenix stance more often they'd need to give it some other benefit then just faster aoe clear.
i myself im not sure exactly what it is it needs in order to be used again.
but the skill definetly needs some love.
